    Woolhampton to Bath 16th - 23rd April 2019 Our route Burbage Wharf near Pewsey We left Woolhampton full of trepidation, wondering what the Kennet and Avon would throw at us next. It turned out to be a confused electronically operated swing bridge. Having waited for the pedestrians on the towpath...

    in Libertybelle
